name: RDS Instances accept traffic only from the Application Servers
query: { dbInstances(where: {securityGroups_SOME: {rules_SOME: {direction: "Inbound", OR: [{sourceToPort_NOT_IN: [3306, 5432, 1521, 1433]}, {OR: [{sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0"}, {sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0"}]}]}}}) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory contentHash }}
